title: Lairds Loch Walk Route

nearby.description: Dundee Walks - Dudhope Park and Dundee Law

images.title: James Allan / Heather by the Loch
images.caption: Heather by the Loch Laird's Loch, a popular stretch of water with anglers. View is in late summer.

images.caption: Hallyburton Community Woodland Map. On the eastern side of the loch, near the car park. Spectacular panoramic views north over Strathmore to the Grampians from here.

images.title: Laird's Loch below North Ballo Hill by Mike Pennington, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Laird's Loch below North Ballo Hill

description: This walk visits the pretty Lairds Loch in the Sidlaw Hills near Dundee . You can start the walk from the roadside parking just to the east of the hill. Then follow footpaths west to reach the loch. You can extend the walk by heading west from the loch to climb to Northballo Hill for great views over the area. There's some good woodland trails surrounding the water as well. To the east there's the Hallyburton Community Woodland while you can find Ballo Woods to the west.
